title: ABB Math Challenge
description: Selected as a winner of the ABB Math Challenge to participate in an intensive 10-day Olympiad Mathematics training program conducted by expert instructors from Russia. The curriculum involved a deep dive into advanced mathematical and algorithmic disciplines, including Game Theory, Graph Theory, and Number Theory. Mastered complex concepts in Probability, Computational Geometry, and advanced Algorithm design. The program was characterized by rigorous seminars and daily competitive assessments, focusing on high-level mathematical logic and sophisticated problem-solving techniques, contributing to a high-ranking performance in final evaluations.
